title: Landing page: add KARM Three.js ASCIIText section + Cult Line image

requirements.summary: Create a Three.js-based ASCIIText React component and add a full-width 'KARM' section above SocialProofSection on the landing page.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page order renders the ASCIIText section before the Social Proof section (before the lines that include "Used during real study sessions").
ASCIIText renders the word "KARM" (not the default text) and respects props: enableWaves={false} and asciiFontSize={7}.
The ASCIIText component cleans up WebGL/DOM resources on unmount (no runaway requestAnimationFrame; event listeners removed).
The section is responsive: it has a stable height on mobile/desktop and does not overflow horizontally.

file_operations.description: Create a reusable Three.js-based ASCII text renderer React component (ported from the provided snippet) that accepts props including text, enableWaves, and asciiFontSize; ensure proper cleanup of requestAnimationFrame, resize handlers/observers, and WebGL resources on unmount.
Create a new full-width landing section that renders the AsciiText component with text="KARM", enableWaves={false}, asciiFontSize={7}, and enforces a stable responsive height with overflow-x hidden.
Wire the new AsciiKarmSection into the landing page flow so it appears above SocialProofSection (i.e., before the section that includes the line "Used during real study sessions").
Add minimal global utility styling (if needed) to support the ASCII section responsiveness (stable height and no horizontal overflow) without changing existing hero/FaultyTerminal behavior.
Ensure Three.js dependency is present for the new ASCIIText component (add/update dependency as needed) and keep build configuration compatible with the existing React template.

requirements.summary: Add the provided Cult Line image as a static frontend asset and display it above the CultLineSection heading with dark-theme responsive styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The image is displayed above the CultLineSection heading text ("Built for people who are done negotiating with themselves.").
The image is served as a static frontend asset (not via backend) and loads correctly in production build.
The image is responsive (keeps aspect ratio, has sensible max width, and does not cause layout shift beyond normal image loading).

file_operations.description: Add the generated cropped/cleaned Cult Line screenshot image as a static public asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/karm-whatsapp-card.dim_736x1472.jpg (no backend routing).
Render the static image above the CultLineSection heading, centered and responsive (preserve aspect ratio, apply sensible max-width, spacing, and dark aesthetic).

requirements.summary: Ensure the Cult Line heading copy matches the exact English sentence case and punctuation.
acceptanceCriteria: The displayed heading text matches exactly: "Built for people who are done negotiating with themselves."
No new non-English user-facing strings are introduced as part of this change.

file_operations.description: Verify and enforce that LANDING_COPY.cultLine.main is exactly "Built for people who are done negotiating with themselves." and keep all newly introduced user-facing text in English.
Ensure the CultLineSection continues to display the exact required heading copy (and does not override it with different casing/punctuation).
